department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: tunic-style; sleeveless; V-neck, front and back; black; line of vertical orange stitching down front and back; alternating orange and blue stitching at side seams, flanked in blue; orange stitching around sleeve openings; blue stitching at bottom hem and around neckline; green V stitching at bottom of neck opening, front and back
title: Blouse, from a five-piece costume
